entry.title: Embedding
entry.summary: You can embed files, using ![[..]] - a syntax inspired by Obsidian. The HTML can be fully customized for each embed types.

entry.title: Custom CSS styling
entry.summary: Parts of your Markdown may be styled using custom CSS classes provided by TailwindCSS.

entry.title: Markdown ✍️
entry.summary: Various non-standard Markdown features supported by Emanote
